message.body: Hey John! I feel like it's been a while since we talked. How are you? I miss ya! Are you coming back to philly anytime soon?

Hey Sam, it has been a while. Sorry for getting back to you so late; I get out of work pretty late. I'm pretty good though. I hope your holidays were relaxing! I'll be in Philadelphia a few times this month. The closest is next weekend. Hopefully you'll be free?
Yes, my holidays were good. Glad to hear you are okay and that I'll be seeing you soon. :) I don't know about this Saturday yet but I know I'm free this
